overview.title: Breadcrumbs Component
overview.description: Breadcrumbs show the current page’s location within a navigational hierarchy. They improve wayfinding and allow quick jumps back to higher-level pages.

best-practices.title: Best Practices
points: Wrap breadcrumbs in <nav aria-label="breadcrumb"> for accessibility.
Use an ordered list (<ol>) of list items (<li>) for structure.
Visually separate items with CSS; do not rely solely on the “/” character.
Mark only the last item with aria-current="page"; ancestors must be links.
Ensure sufficient color contrast for links vs. current item.
